org.hps.util

Class FilterMCBunches

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.util.FilterMCBunches

  • public class FilterMCBunches
extends Object
    Selects LCIO events passing a cut; spaces out these events with blank events. Intended use is to clean up a photon-run MC file before running trigger and readout sim. Can also be used to chain multiple LCIO files together.
